title: Behind Locked Doors Volume 1
description: She wakes up to find herself locked in a harem. It would have been a great as a dream, except it isn’t. And now she’s stuck with four men, or Masters as they want to be called, and an assortment of other women all but begging to satiate their hungers.Follow Thursday’s first weeks in the harem as she fights not to get caught up and end up one of these nameless women. She keeps on telling them no but this is their game and they all want to be the first to get the ultimate prize-to make her come.
author: Emma Hillman
